data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of HaMerkaz.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of HaMerkaz, Israel
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of HaMerkaz, Israel. Please, stir the 12,867 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in HaMerkaz, Israel to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in HaMerkaz, Israel to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Yudi, Tripolita'it people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, help the local leaders in HaMerkaz, Israel not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 12,867 believers in HaMerkaz to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,822,867 who are far from you in HaMerkaz, Israel from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: HaMerkaz
location.cities_list: Netanya, Rishon LeẔiyyon, Reẖovot, Ramla, Ness Ziona
location.cities_list_w_pop: Netanya (224,471), Rishon LeẔiyyon (220,492), Reẖovot (143,904), Ramla (63,860), Ness Ziona (50,351)
